name: WarBound
description:
Warbound is a Tatical Rpg, where you control Eldred, the son of the Lord of the House of Lowes where he confront thier neighbor after they suddenly attack then.

There is 7 Chapters and 3 Side quests.

With a Total of 9 Characters.

This is was done for a College Project and so there are some rough patcheshave  bugs. And I may decide to expand on the idea so feedback is apreciated.
